page.title: 13THE PRESENT POPULATION.
page.content:
We undertook a survey of all the inhabitants of Haslingfield today. This is what we asked: 1.Please tick into which age group the inhabitants of your house fall. 0-10 11-20 21-30 31-40 41-50 51-60 61-70 over 70
2.How many people in the household are wage earners? What jobs do they do?
3.How long have you lived in Haslingfield?
4.Where did you live before Haslingfield? (S.Poole,H.Carr,M.Sewell,N.Quinn, S.Bennett,A.Gray). The class delivered 544 questionnaires of which 253 were returned. There were 2.29 inhabitants and 1.23 wage earners per household.(S.Bennett)
